external_references.description: Patrick Wardle. (2020, June 29). OSX.EvilQuest Uncovered part i: infection, persistence, and more!. Retrieved March 18, 2021.

objects.description: When running with root privileges after a [Launch Agent](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1543/001) is installed, [ThiefQuest](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0595) installs a plist file to the /Library/LaunchDaemons/ folder with the RunAtLoad key set to true establishing persistence as a Launch Daemon. (Citation: wardle evilquest parti)
